title: Feenix Gaming Looking for Top/Mid/Support/Jungle
body:
This is going to be a serious team entering in tourneys weekly after we begin playing. Must be at least Silver 3 or higher. Fill out the app and then add me if interested.
Rank-
Role-
Top 3 Champs-
Curse Voice-
Tourney Experience-
Strengths-
Weakness-
Time Zone-

replies.body:
Rank- Plat 5
Role- Midlane
Top 3 Champs- Azir, Ahri, Xerath
Curse Voice- Yes
Tourney Experience- Notsostock 5v5 Tournament (2 times)
Strengths- Great lane mechanics, good communication, innate synergy with teammates, can shotcall.
Weakness- Tend to deal with being camped poorly because i'm very aggressive.
Time Zone- Central

Hey! My in game name is Dreghost and I am looking to join a team!

Rank- S5 solo, s3 team
Role- Top
Top 3 Champs- J4, Mundo, Panth
Curse Voice- N/A, Can get it though
Tourney Experience- SLL (Saskatchewan LoL League)
Strengths- Decent with farming and excellent communication
Weakness- Can work on focusing in team fights and using Tp's more effectively 
Time Zone- Saskatchewan Time (NA)

Come join Vigorous Gaming and we can work a partnership and help advertise your team? we are a competitive LoL community with tournaments on weekends and scrims/practice on weekdays, we'll create your own 5v5s team setup under our own Ts3 channel group and bring your team mates also. We'll also create ur own team roster on our website with a nice gfx banner with your Team name/Roster.

If interested contact me on Ts3, VG website or reply back here.

Come check us out! :D

Ts3 ip - virgorousgaming.teampseak3.com:3526

Vigorous Gaming website - www.vigorousgaming.esportsify.com

Peace.
